Topic.Title: Having trouble with the Invpane2 library

Posts.EditableText:
Okay so someone gave my a source code of a game they made to look at.
It uses the Invpane2.aslx Library, it also use the Invpane2.Js code. I have put both of those into the project and I get know errors until I start the game. 
Apparently it's having trouble establishing what the SetInventory2Label fuction is which is part of the library. I don't understand I loaded the Invpane2 library and the javascript file which is called in a function in the code. 
Here is a link to the library code, and the documentation about it.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThePix/quest/master/InvPane2.aslx
https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki
So why isn't it working?
